name: CORPSE MEDITATION FOR THE RAT UNDER MY BED AND ALSO THE UNIVERSE

description:
CORPSE MEDITATION FOR THE RAT UNDER MY BED  AND ALSO THE UNIVERSE

a poem for the heat death of the universe bitsy jam

dedicated to my cats 香菇 and 蘑菇, the universe,

and the rat
